definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: corner (late (Aram. [[זׇוִיתָא]], zowiyto0 (oft. for Heb. [[פִּנׇּה]], [[מִקְחוֹעַ]]), hence, as loan-word (Frä:Aram. Fremdw. 11, 168) Ar. za0wiyah;un);—Pl. abs. [[זׇוִיּוֹת]] Ps 144:12; cstr. [[זׇוִיּׁת]] Zec 9:15; —[[וּמָֽלְאוּ כַמִּזְרָק כְּזׇוִיּׁת מִוְבֵּךְַ]] Zec 9:15 simil. of warriors streaming with blood, v. Le 1:5, Le 1:11 etc.; ´[[בְּנוֹתֵינוּ כְּז]] ´[[וגו]] Ps 144:12 out daughters like corner (-pillar)s, carved (so Che al., but v. II. [[חטב]]) in palace-fashion.
